contexts.context: Imalyn laughed loudly, "Can I see a <mark>demonstration</mark> sometime?"
Lledos's expertise was <mark>demonstrated</mark> a dozen times, and the guards were of such a...
...were of such a diverse variety, he was able to <mark>demonstrate</mark> all the means of silent assassination he had developed over the...
...for the duties of Imperial citizenship. Troopers are expected to <mark>demonstrate</mark> mastery of the long blade, the spear and blunt weapons...
...a matter of rolling and twisting the body like so. I'll <mark>demonstrate</mark> it if you want."
